title: U.S. advanced flat glass prices in 1999 and 2019 by glass type
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Flat glass Prices on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum Flat glass Prices among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum Flat glass Prices was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the maximum Flat glass Prices and it saw the lowest in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass out of all 8 Glass Types.
The maximum Flat glass Prices for 1999 that was found in Glass Type Smart glass was 49.42 times larger than the minimum Flat glass Prices observed in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Flat glass Prices.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum Flat glass Prices among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum Flat glass Prices was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Flat glass Prices on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum Flat glass Prices among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum Flat glass Prices was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the maximum Flat glass Prices and it saw the lowest in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass out of all 8 Glass Types.
The maximum Flat glass Prices for 1999 that was found in Glass Type Smart glass was 49.42 times larger than the minimum Flat glass Prices observed in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Flat glass Prices on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 1999 had the highest Flat glass Prices in Glass Type Smart glass and 2019 had the lowest Flat glass Prices in Glass Type Safety glass.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the highest Flat glass Prices among all 8 Glass Types and it has the lowest Flat glass Prices in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass.
Glass Type Smart glass and Burglary resistant glass had the biggest gap of 3728.0 between the highest and lowest Flat glass Prices found for 1999.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Flat glass Prices was found in case of 1999.
On average, the Glass Type Smart glass had the highest Flat glass Prices for all 2 groups 1999, and 2019. Whereas Safety glass had the lowest average Flat glass Prices.
